import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from './cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'], }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} getCart() { return this.cartService.get(); } }
